extendedInfo.description: Download the Patient.co.uk app to search our database of patient information leaflets on health, conditions and diseases. You can also quickly locate health services in your area (England only).Each leaflet is written by our expert authoring team of independent GPs, and passes the information standard - which means it is trusted, high quality, evidence-based health information.Most GPs in the UK have the same leaflets on their computer to print out for patients during consultations.The app features:* Over 900 trusted patient information leaflets on health, conditions and diseases* Browse categories or search for the condition you require* Store favourites in your bookmarks* Share or email leaflets* Locate medical services near you (currently only available in England)* Search for GPs, Dentists, Pharmacys, Hospitals or opticians in your areaPLEASE NOTE - THE APP REQUIRES A 3G OR BROADBAND CONNECTION TO WORK. This is to ensure our most up to date content is downloaded and the data remains part of our information standard review process.http://www.Patient.co.uk - Trusted medical information and support

reviews.title: OK, but let down by poor data
reviews.comment: This has the potential to be a 5star app. The medical help sheets seem to be ok. The \'services\' section is a huge letdown. 1st, the Google Maps is an old outdated version, 2nd, the doctors surgery section has pushpins in the wrong map position, 3rd, the pharmacy section seems to have about 60% of existing ones missing.  Very poor show for the services section.
reviews.author: Sean P

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: Thanks for the utility.
reviews.author: Zakaullah Khan Sherwani

reviews.comment: Sans the adverts

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: I have worked for nhs last 20 years think this website is brilliant even better no that there is app for mobiles so much info bout all kinds of things recommend +++ to friends and family.all the time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy app
reviews.comment: This app is handy, however, as I work in a pharmacy I like to keep myself informed on the info about conditions. However, the app doesn\'t give specific names of drugs which would be given. The website does provide this info, so should the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok.....but
reviews.comment: Has lots of information to offer but only giving 3 stars due to the annoying adverts. Why not offer an ad free version?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the website, this app needs the professional reference section please\tI\'m a medical student and was hoping the professional reference section would be on this app, please add it as it would be really useful!

reviews.title: Google Nexus 7 for a 70+
reviews.comment: Very good as far as it goes. But search engine needs a lot of work. Eg. \"Asperger\'s\" is found but not \"Aspergers\" which as a lay person I thought it was. Google enlightened me.
